Name: Glabrezu
DamageResistances:
bludgeoning,	
piercing,	and	slashing	from	nonmagical	attacks

Traits.Name: Innate	Spellcasting
Traits.Content:
The	glabrezuâ€™s	spellcasting	ability	
is	Intelligence	(spell	save	DC	16).	The	glabrezu	can	
innately	cast	the	following	spells,	requiring	no	material	
components:
At	will:	darkness,	detect	magic,	dispel	magic
1/day	each:	confusion,	fly,	power	word	stun

Traits.Name: Magic	Resistance
Traits.Content:
The	glabrezu	has	advantage	on	
saving	throws	against	spells	and	other	magical	effects.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content:
The	glabrezu	makes	four	attacks:	two	with	
its	pincers	and	two	with	its	fists.	Alternatively,	it	makes	
two	attacks	with	its	pincers	and	casts	one	spell.

Actions.Name: Pincer
Actions.Content:
Melee	Weapon	Attack: +9	to	hit,	reach	10	ft.,	
one	target.	Hit: 16	(2d10	+	5)	bludgeoning	damage.	If	
the	target	is	a	Medium	or	smaller	creature,	it	is	
grappled	(escape	DC	15).	The	glabrezu	has	two	pincers,	
each	of	which	can	grapple	only	one	target.

Actions.Name: Fist
Actions.Content:
Melee	Weapon	Attack: +9	to	hit,	reach	5	ft.,	one	
target.	Hit:	7	(2d4	+	2)	bludgeoning	damage.
